Package niagara.ndom

Interface Summary
DOMImplementation DOMImplementation is the interface implemented by all DOM implementations.
DOMParser DOMParser is the interface implemented by all Niagara DOM implementations.
 

Class Summary
DOMFactory DOMFactory allows us to choose a DOM implementation at runtime.
SAXDOM SAXDOM wraps the read-only "DOM as SAX events" implementation.
SAXDOMParser SAXDOMParser constructs read-only SAXDOM documents from a SAX source
SimpleHandler  
SimpleHandler2  
SimpleXML4JHandler  
XercesJ XercesJ wraps the Apache Xerces DOM implementation.
XercesJ2 XercesJ wraps the Apache Xerces DOM implementation.
XercesJ2Parser XercesJParser is a wrapper for org.apache.xerces.parsers.DOMParser;
XercesJParser XercesJParser is a wrapper for org.apache.xerces.parsers.DOMParser;
XML4J XML4J is another IBM DOM implementation.
XML4JParser XML4JParser is a wrapper for com.ibm.xml.parsers.DOMParser
 

Exception Summary
InvalidDOMRepException InvalidDOMRepException Some code requires a certain DOM represention, this error can be thrown when the wrong representation is detected
